name: チェンソーマン || CHAINSAW MAN
name_original: チェンソーマン || CHAINSAW MAN
description:
how to play..
(like the fruit ninja..)

1.click/tap screen to point your man of chainsaw
2.blood meter on my left equals HP and petrol of saw
3.kill enemy
4.enemy chain kill  more than x10 to open BLOODRAGE
5.BLOODRAGE make more point
6. follow @ZuEhtisham and @moomoomang
